backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing app owner, admin allowlist, user profiles, vendors, products, and authorization, with metadata queries and upgrade support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, feature descriptions, related components, and test IDs for recent admin/app-owner updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles and behaviors of all major frontend files including routing, hooks, layouts, auth guards, and dashboard pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router structure with public routes, protected admin/vendor areas, and app-wide layout and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Authentication control component handling Internet Identity login/logout, principal display, and role-mode clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guard component that checks admin or app-owner status and displays loading, error, or access-denied UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Requires an authenticated Internet Identity session, showing loading or login UI until identity exists.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Ensures a role mode is selected and redirects to the role selection page if missing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout with header, content area, and footer including a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Main navigation bar with links, role-aware admin access, and identity-based controls.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectio: Displays backend connection, environment, and authentication status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Vendor product create/edit form handling validation, submission to backend, and error display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceQueries: Defines React Query hooks for fetching marketplace data such as products, vendors, and verified vendor lists using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes queries for backend metadata, health checks, and user identity using the actor and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleMode.ts: Manages user role mode (admin or vendor) with localStorage persistence and helper flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, light/dark color schemes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Admin interface placeholder page enabling admin and vendor management actions via backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing marketplace introduction and navigation to product browsing and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single product’s details, handling loading, error states, vendor info, and navigation back to the product list.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductsPage.ts: Shows all published products with search and category filtering, plus loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Provides role selection between admin and vendor, checking authorization before navigation.
frontend/src/pages/VendorLayoutPage.tsx: Defines the vendor dashboard layout with tabs for profile and product management.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPlaceholderPage: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProductsPage.ts: Displays and manages the vendor’s products, including creating and editing items with dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProfilePage.tsx: Allows vendors to view and update their profile information with form handling and mutation feedback.
Lists verified vendors in a grid with loading, error, and empty states, and supports navigation to individual vendor pages.
Displays a single vendor’s profile and products with loading and error states, using router params and marketplace query hooks.
frontend/src/types/marketplace.ts: Placeholder file for marketplace-related TypeScript types.
frontend/src/utils/placeholders.ts: Exports static placeholder image paths for products and vendor logos.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current phase, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
